Interface IExerciseMode

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ExModeTranscriptLangUserLang, ExModeUserLangTranscriptLang

    public interface IExerciseMode
    This interface is giving prototypes needed for checking modes Exercise class
    Author:
    anthonyrey

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Symbol createSymbolFromAnswer(javax.swing.ImageIcon answer)
      This method returns a Symbol containing only the parameter corresponding to the needed format for answer It is a bit messy, but this helps keeping polymorphism work when using solver.
      Symbol createSymbolFromAnswer(java.lang.String answer)
      This method returns a Symbol containing only the parameter corresponding to the needed format for answer It is a bit messy, but this helps keeping polymorphism work when using solver.
      java.lang.String getAnswers(Symbol answer)
      This method returns the given Symbol in the format relative to the one needed for the answer.
      java.lang.String getQuestion(Symbol wantedSymbol)
      This method returns the given Symbol in the format relative to the one needed for the question.

    • Method Detail

      • createSymbolFromAnswer

        Symbol createSymbolFromAnswer(javax.swing.ImageIcon answer)
        This method returns a Symbol containing only the parameter corresponding to the needed format for answer It is a bit messy, but this helps keeping polymorphism work when using solver. Ex : English to Japanese == new Symbol(null, null, answer, null, null, null).
        Parameters:
        answer - The Image generated from the user drawing
        Returns:
        a Symbol containing the right format of the String only
        See Also:
        Symbol

      • createSymbolFromAnswer

        Symbol createSymbolFromAnswer(java.lang.String answer)
        This method returns a Symbol containing only the parameter corresponding to the needed format for answer It is a bit messy, but this helps keeping polymorphism work when using solver. Ex : English to Japanese == new Symbol(null, answer, null, null, null, null).
        Parameters:
        answer - The String containing user response to the exercise
        Returns:
        a Symbol containing the right format of the String only
        See Also:
        Symbol

      • getAnswers

        java.lang.String getAnswers(Symbol answer)
        This method returns the given Symbol in the format relative to the one needed for the answer. Ex : English to Japanese == Question : A and Anwser : „ÅÇ.
        Parameters:
        answer - The symbol corresponding to one of the possible answer in QCM mode
        Returns:
        a String containing the right format of the symbol

      • getQuestion

        java.lang.String getQuestion(Symbol wantedSymbol)
        This method returns the given Symbol in the format relative to the one needed for the question. Ex : English to Japanese == Question : A and Anwser : „ÅÇ.
        Parameters:
        wantedSymbol - The symbol corresponding to the user learned symbol
        Returns:
        a String containing the right format of the symbol
